statements: SELECT * FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_schedule FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance;
SELECT * FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, service_history FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_schedule FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE robot_id > 3 ORDER BY robot_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_id FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%' AND service_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule IN ('bi-weekly', 'quarterly') ORDER BY robot_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT robot_id) AS robot_count, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM RoboticEquipmentMaintenance;
SELECT * FROM robot_equipment;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_schedule FROM robot_equipment ORDER BY robot_name ASC;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_schedule FROM robot_equipment WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE robot_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, maintenance_schedule, service_history FROM robot_equipment WHERE robot_name = 'Robot A'
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, maintenance_schedule FROM robot_equipment WHERE robot_id < 5 ORDER BY robot_id DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT robot_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_details IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM RobotEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM RobotEquipment;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM MaintenanceTechnicians ORDER BY technician_specialty DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM RobotEquipment WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM RobotEquipment JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON RobotEquipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RobotEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM RobotEquipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTechnicians ORDER BY technician_experience DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM MaintenanceTechnicians WHERE technician_experience > 2;
SELECT m.*, t.technician_name FROM MaintenanceRecords m JOIN MaintenanceTechnicians t ON m.technician_id = t.technician_id;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, equipment_id, service_date, service_type FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM EquipmentDetails WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT technician_id, technician_name, technician_specialization FROM TechnicianDetails ORDER BY technician_experience DESC, technician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM EquipmentDetails WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialization FROM TechnicianDetails ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT service_id, service_type, service_details FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_type = 'Repair' AND service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule JOIN ServiceHistory ON MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id = ServiceHistory.equipment_id WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM robotic_equipment;
SELECT id, equipment_name, status FROM robotic_equipment WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT equipment_name, model_number FROM robotic_equipment ORDER BY model_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, expertise_area FROM service_engineers ORDER BY engineer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM robotic_equipment WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT equipment_name, model_number FROM robotic_equipment ORDER BY model_number DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT engineer_name, expertise_area FROM service_engineers WHERE engineer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
